Plot: Loretta Castorini, a book keeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.
Title: Moonstruck
Actors: Cher, Nicolas Cage, Vincent Gardenia, Olympia Dukakis
tomatoConsensus: Led by energetic performances from Nicolas Cage and Cher, Moonstruck is an exuberantly funny tribute to love and one of the decade's most appealing comedies.
